location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP SHOWING SELECTION BY THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED UNDER CONCESSION DATED DECEMBER 2ND 1925'

mods.abstract: The second schedule to the lease dated 29 December 1934 made between the Sheikh of Bahrein and the Bahrain Petroleum Company showing the area selected by the Bahrain Petroleum Company under their concession agreement with the Government of Bahrain signed 2 December 1925. The map includes a paragraph of text titled 'description of selection' which gives further details of the exact area covered by the map including longitude and latitude coordinates of points along the boundary.The area of selection is marked with a black line along which is given the longitude and latitude coordinates of the line's location and its height above sea level.Includes an inset: 'Muharrak Island'Signed His Excellency the Shaikh of Bahrain, F A Davies, J M Russell
